com.i2group.apollo.model.data.transport.factory

Class PropertyValueFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.i2group.apollo.model.data.transport.factory.PropertyValueFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.i2group.apollo.model.data.transport.factory.IPropertyValueFactory

    public final class PropertyValueFactory
extends Object
implements com.i2group.apollo.model.data.transport.factory.IPropertyValueFactory
    A factory for creating PropertyValues to be used in calls to the command service.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PropertyValueFactory()
      Constructs a new PropertyValueFactory.

      PropertyValue createComplexPropertyValue(List<CompoundPropertyValue> values)
      Creates and returns a PropertyValue that is made up from several other PropertyValues.

      Creates and returns a PropertyValue that is made up from several Strings.
      PropertyValue createDateTimePropertyValue(XMLGregorianCalendar calendar, String timeZoneId, boolean isInDaylightTime)
      Creates and returns a PropertyValue that contains date and time information.
      PropertyValue createDocumentPropertyValue(String docuemntId, String fileName, long fileSizeInBytes)
      Creates and returns a property value that contains a document.

      Creates and returns a PropertyValue that contains a simple String value.

      • createCompoundPropertyValue

        public PropertyValue createCompoundPropertyValue(List<String> values)
        Creates and returns a PropertyValue that is made up from several Strings. For example, a LogicalType.DATE_AND_TIME.
        Parameters:
        values - Strings containing the values for the PropertyValue.
        Returns:
        See above.

      • createComplexPropertyValue

        public PropertyValue createComplexPropertyValue(List<CompoundPropertyValue> values)
        Creates and returns a PropertyValue that is made up from several other PropertyValues.
        Parameters:
        values - PropertyValues that will be assembled to create the value for the PropertyValue.
        Returns:
        See above.

      • createUTCDateTimePropertyValue

        public PropertyValue createUTCDateTimePropertyValue(Date date)
        Creates and returns a PropertyValue that contains date and time information.
        Parameters:
        date - A Date representing the date and time values for the PropertyValue.
        Returns:
        See above.

      • createDateTimePropertyValue

        public PropertyValue createDateTimePropertyValue(XMLGregorianCalendar calendar,
                                        String timeZoneId,
                                        boolean isInDaylightTime)
        Creates and returns a PropertyValue that contains date and time information.
        Parameters:
        calendar - An XMLGregorianCalendar representing the date and time values for the PropertyValue.
        timeZoneId - A String containing the time zone identifier.
        isInDaylightTime - true if the specified date and time occurs during daylight saving time; false otherwise.
        Returns:
        See above.

      • createDocumentPropertyValue

        public PropertyValue createDocumentPropertyValue(String docuemntId,
                                        String fileName,
                                        long fileSizeInBytes)
        Creates and returns a property value that contains a document.
        Parameters:
        docuemntId - A String containing the identifier of the document.
        fileName - A String containing the file name of the document.
        fileSizeInBytes - The size of the document, in bytes.
        Returns:
        See above.
